con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-BankTransfer-Pain001-BookginDate
con:testCase.con:description: Tests camt054-credit files with wrong values in element: <BookDt> Expected: Files must be not processed

con:config.con:query: SELECT t.parameters FROM TASK t WHERE t.id > '${#TestCase#emailMaxID}' AND t.TASK_TYPE_ID = 9 ORDER BY t.id DESC
